verses.verse: And an angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> came up <WH5927> <WH8799> from Gilgal <WH1537> to Bochim <WH1066>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, I made you to go up <WH5927> <WH8686> out of Egypt <WH4714>, and have brought <WH935> <WH8686> you unto the land <WH776> which I sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto your fathers <WH1>; and I said <WH559> <WH8799>, I will never <WH5769> break <WH6565> <WH8686> my covenant <WH1285> with you.

And ye shall make <WH3772> <WH8799> no league <WH1285> with the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of this land <WH776>; ye shall throw down <WH5422> <WH8799> their altars <WH4196>: but ye have not obeyed <WH8085> <WH8804> my voice <WH6963>: why have ye done <WH6213> <WH8804> this?

Wherefore I also said <WH559> <WH8804>, I will not drive them out <WH1644> <WH8762> from before <WH6440> you; but they shall be as tshofars in your sides <WH6654>, and their 'elohim <WH430> shall be a snare <WH4170> unto you.

And it came to pass, when the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8763> these words <WH1697> unto all the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, that the people <WH5971> lifted up <WH5375> <WH8799> their voice <WH6963>, and wept <WH1058> <WH8799>.
And they called <WH7121> <WH8799> the name <WH8034> of that place <WH4725> Bochim <WH1066>: and they sacrificed <WH2076> <WH8799> there unto the YY <WH3068>.

And when Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> had let the people <WH5971> go <WH7971> <WH8762>, the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> went <WH3212> <WH8799> every man <WH376> unto his inheritance <WH5159> to possess <WH3423> <WH8800> the land <WH776>.

And the people <WH5971> served <WH5647> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068> all the days <WH3117> of Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, and all the days <WH3117> of the elders <WH2205> that outlived <WH748> <WH8689> <WH3117> <WH310> Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, who had seen <WH7200> <WH8804> all the great <WH1419> works <WH4639> of the YY <WH3068>, that he did <WH6213> <WH8804> for Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, the servant <WH5650> of the YY <WH3068>, died <WH4191> <WH8799>, being an hundred <WH3967> and ten <WH6235> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>.

And they buried <WH6912> <WH8799> him in the border <WH1366> of his inheritance <WH5159> in Timnathheres <WH8556>, in the mount <WH2022> of Efrayim <WH669>, on the north side <WH6828> of the hill <WH2022> Gaash <WH1608>.

And also all that generation <WH1755> were gathered <WH622> <WH8738> unto their fathers <WH1>: and there arose <WH6965> <WH8799> another <WH312> generation <WH1755> after <WH310> them, which knew <WH3045> <WH8804> not the YY <WH3068>, nor yet the works <WH4639> which he had done <WH6213> <WH8804> for Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> did <WH6213> <WH8799> evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the YY <WH3068>, and served <WH5647> <WH8799> Baalim <WH1168>:

And they forsook <WH5800> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of their fathers <WH1>, which brought them out <WH3318> <WH8688> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, and followed <WH3212> <WH8799> <WH310> other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430>, of the 'elohim <WH430> of the people <WH5971> that were round about <WH5439> them, and bowed <WH7812> <WH8691> themselves unto them, and provoked the YY <WH3068> to anger <WH3707> <WH8686>.
And they forsook <WH5800> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068>, and served <WH5647> <WH8799> Baal <WH1168> and Ashtaroth <WH6252>.

And the anger <WH639> of the YY <WH3068> was hot <WH2734> <WH8799> against Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and he delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> them into the hands <WH3027> of spoilers <WH8154> <WH8802> that spoiled <WH8155> <WH8799> them, and he sold <WH4376> <WH8799> them into the hands <WH3027> of their enemies <WH341> <WH8802> round about <WH5439>, so that they could <WH3201> <WH8804> not any longer <WH5750> stand <WH5975> <WH8800> before <WH6440> their enemies <WH341> <WH8802>.

Whithersoever they went out <WH3318> <WH8804>, the hand <WH3027> of the YY <WH3068> was against them for evil <WH7451>, as the YY <WH3068> had said <WH1696> <WH8765>, and as the YY <WH3068> had sworn <WH7650> <WH8738> unto them: and they were greatly <WH3966> distressed <WH3334> <WH8799>.
Nevertheless the YY <WH3068> raised up <WH6965> <WH8686> judges <WH8199> <WH8802>, which delivered <WH3467> <WH8686> them out of the hand <WH3027> of those that spoiled <WH8154> <WH8802> them.

And yet they would not hearken <WH8085> <WH8804> unto their judges <WH8199> <WH8802>, but they went a whoring <WH2181> <WH8804> after <WH310> other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430>, and bowed <WH7812> <WH8691> themselves unto them: they turned <WH5493> <WH8804> quickly <WH4118> out of the way <WH1870> which their fathers <WH1> walked in <WH1980> <WH8804>, obeying <WH8085> <WH8800> the Mitzvot <WH4687> of the YY <WH3068>; but they did <WH6213> <WH8804> not so.

And when the YY <WH3068> raised <WH6965> <WH8689> them up judges <WH8199> <WH8802>, then the YY <WH3068> was with the judge <WH8199> <WH8802>, and delivered <WH3467> <WH8689> them out of the hand <WH3027> of their enemies <WH341> <WH8802> all the days <WH3117> of the judge <WH8199> <WH8802>: for it repented <WH5162> <WH8735> the YY <WH3068> because <WH6440> of their groanings <WH5009> by reason of them that oppressed <WH3905> <WH8801> them and vexed <WH1766> <WH8802> them.

And it came to pass, when the judge <WH8199> <WH8802> was dead <WH4194>, that they returned <WH7725> <WH8799>, and corrupted <WH7843> <WH8689> themselves more than their fathers <WH1>, in following <WH3212> <WH8800> <WH310> other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430> to serve <WH5647> <WH8800> them, and to bow down <WH7812> <WH8692> unto them; they ceased <WH5307> <WH8689> not from their own doings <WH4611>, nor from their stubborn <WH7186> way <WH1870>.

And the anger <WH639> of the YY <WH3068> was hot <WH2734> <WH8799> against Yisra'EL <WH3478>; and he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Because that this people <WH1471> hath transgressed <WH5674> <WH8804> my covenant <WH1285> which I commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> their fathers <WH1>, and have not hearkened <WH8085> <WH8804> unto my voice <WH6963>;

I also will not henceforth <WH3254> <WH8686> drive out <WH3423> <WH8687> any <WH376> from before <WH6440> them of the nations <WH1471> which Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> left <WH5800> <WH8804> when he died <WH4191> <WH8799>:

That through them I may prove <WH5254> <WH8763> Yisra'EL <WH3478>, whether they will keep <WH8104> <WH8802> the way <WH1870> of the YY <WH3068> to walk <WH3212> <WH8800> therein, as their fathers <WH1> did keep <WH8104> <WH8804> it, or not.

Therefore the YY <WH3068> left <WH3240> <WH8686> those nations <WH1471>, without <WH1115> driving them out <WH3423> <WH8687> hastily <WH4118>; neither delivered <WH5414> <WH8804> he them into the hand <WH3027> of Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>.
